original:
Once data has been
erased, it cannot be
recovered.
Are you sure you want
to erase this data?
translation:
Once data has been
erased, it cannot be
recovered.
Are you sure you want
to erase this data?

original:
All saved data has been
erased.
translation:
All saved data has been
erased.

original:
Saved data could not be
erased. This Game Card
has been damaged and
cannot be used.
translation:
Saved data could not be
erased. This Game Card
has been damaged and
cannot be used.

original:
Use your emblem on your
kart.
translation:
Use your emblem on your
kart.

original:
When Locate Friend is on, the game will
automatically search for friends who are
seeking opponents while you are logged on to
Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. An icon will appear
to notify you when a friend has been found.
translation:
When Locate Friend is on, the game will
automatically search for friends who are
seeking opponents while you are logged on to
Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. An icon will appear
to notify you when a friend has been found.

original:
- When people are using
  PictoChat nearby
translation:
- When people are using
  PictoChat nearby

original:
- When people are playing a
  VS match nearby
translation:
- When people are playing a
  VS match nearby

original:
- When a Wi-Fi opponent is found
  if searching for one
translation:
- When a Wi-Fi opponent is found
  if searching for one
